医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现高血压会增加气道阻力并影响肺功能高血压（高血压）会导致血管增厚和动脉硬化（动脉硬化）。巴西研究人员进行的一项研究首次表明，肺部也出现了类似的现象。高血压会使支气管变硬，增加气道阻力，损害呼吸能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/High-blood-Pressure-found-to-increase-airway-resistance-and-affect-lung-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/High-blood-Pressure-found-to-increase-airway-resistance-and-affect-lung-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffe68692-2e19-4a8e-be24-682cb37c9c30 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 02:22:22 -0400 High blood pressure found to increase airway resistance and affect lung function
二甲双胍对计划生育的 2 型糖尿病男性来说是安全的《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项针对超过 300 万例妊娠的大型研究得出结论，患有 2 型糖尿病的潜在父亲可以放心，服用二甲双胍药物不会导致后代出生缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Metformin-found-safe-for-men-with-type-2-diabetes-planning-for-parenthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Metformin-found-safe-for-men-with-type-2-diabetes-planning-for-parenthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=654acafb-45da-4a67-90f8-96117d6cd277 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 02:15:00 -0400 Metformin found safe for men with type 2 diabetes planning for parenthood
CBTN 数据推动小儿脑肿瘤研究取得飞跃Gabriella Miller Kids First 数据资源中心 (Kids First DRC) 宣布将完整的儿童脑肿瘤网络 (CBTN) 数据集添加到 Kids First DRC 门户。这一重要的里程碑为全世界的研究人员提供了前所未有的途径来访问庞大的儿科脑肿瘤数据存储库，为突破性发现和加速创新疗法的开发铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Pediatric-brain-tumor-research-takes-leap-forward-with-CBTN-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Pediatric-brain-tumor-research-takes-leap-forward-with-CBTN-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7251fdd-5e85-4672-adf3-7c1640a4c555 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 01:20:54 -0400 Pediatric brain tumor research takes leap forward with CBTN data
组织芯片有助于将呼吸道疾病研究转化为临床应用科学家们正在开发先进的工具来理解和治疗神经系统症状，例如与流感等呼吸道疾病相关的脑雾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Tissue-chips-help-translate-respiratory-disease-research-into-clinical-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Tissue-chips-help-translate-respiratory-disease-research-into-clinical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aae059fa-b03e-4e2b-9f8e-8c8310e89694 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 01:15:37 -0400 Tissue chips help translate respiratory disease research into clinical applications
更深入地了解 COVID-19 传播和胎儿健康克利夫兰诊所领导的一项新研究发表在《EMBO 杂志》上，表明轻微且无症状的 SARS-CoV-2 感染可以触发孕妇的免疫反应，从而可能导致发育中的胎儿出现严重的炎症反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/A-deeper-look-at-COVID-19-transmission-and-fetal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/A-deeper-look-at-COVID-19-transmission-and-fetal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7368ba23-9fe3-423d-8ebf-78a4e600946a Thu, 17 Oct 2024 01:10:36 -0400 A deeper look at COVID-19 transmission and fetal health
肠道细菌可防止 PFAS 引起的肾脏损害新的研究表明，全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质（PFAS）与肾脏损伤之间的联系可能与肠道微生物组的失调有关，肠道微生物组由生活在消化道中的细菌和其他微生物组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Gut-bacteria-protect-against-PFAS-induced-kidney-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Gut-bacteria-protect-against-PFAS-induced-kidney-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b3f26da-f754-4486-8b6c-583282f52dc1 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 01:00:01 -0400 Gut bacteria protect against PFAS-induced kidney harm
评估和解决儿科环境中的 IP 人员配置需求今天发表在《美国感染控制杂志》(AJIC) 上的一篇新论文描述了一家大型儿童医院为评估和满足其感染预防和控制人员需求所做的努力，强调了为这一重要角色分配足够资源的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Assessing-and-addressing-IP-staffing-needs-in-a-pediatric-setting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Assessing-and-addressing-IP-staffing-needs-in-a-pediatric-setting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f73d33a7-77de-42e8-bdea-7b9d6daf0f57 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 00:52:20 -0400 Assessing and addressing IP staffing needs in a pediatric setting
基因分析显示吸烟和高体重指数会增加患痴呆症的风险，但教育和锻炼可以保护对 400,000 名参与者进行的孟德尔随机分组显示，吸烟、高 BMI 和高胆固醇是痴呆症的主要遗传风险因素，而较长时间的教育和体力活动可降低风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Genetic-analysis-shows-smoking-and-high-BMI-increase-dementia-risk-but-education-and-exercise-protect.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Genetic-analysis-shows-smoking-and-high-BMI-increase-dementia-risk-but-education-and-exercise-protect.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3ebaaf5-6bde-4be5-819c-52d9828f54eb Thu, 17 Oct 2024 00:31:00 -0400 Genetic analysis shows smoking and high BMI increase dementia risk, but education and exercise protect
FDA 加强人工智能监管，确保患者安全和医疗保健创新FDA 正在调整法规来管理人工智能在医疗保健领域的快速发展，重点关注患者安全和人工智能工具的生命周期。本次审查强调需要持续监测，以确保人工智能在临床环境中有效发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-strengthens-AI-regulation-to-ensure-patent-safety-and-innovation-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-strengthens-AI-regulation-to-ensure-patent-safety-and-innovation-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6019fb4d-d1e1-4970-8a04-620342230a8d Wed, 16 Oct 2024 23:46:00 -0400 FDA strengthens AI regulation to ensure patient safety and innovation in healthcare
扩大 GLP-1 减肥药物的使用范围可以挽救数千人的生命研究人员估计，扩大减肥药物的使用范围每年可以挽救超过 50,000 人的生命，降低肥胖率并解决健康不平等问题。目前的药物摄入水平可以大大减少死亡人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Expanding-access-to-GLP-1-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Expanding-access-to-GLP-1-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a4b4bb5-4b0a-49a0-80e2-5b4b441e4761 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Expanding access to GLP-1 weight-loss drugs could save thousands of lives
